item.title: Everybody Loves A Nut
item.dc:creator: Robert Dayton
item.description: So like a month or three back this Vancouver based mag called The Nerve wanted to do a primer on what they call “Cozmic Country” and asked me to recommend some records and artists for it. So I did. I reprint them here one by one, and if savvy enough, day by day: Johnny Cash- … Continue reading "Everybody Loves A Nut"
item.content:encoded:
So like a month or three back this Vancouver based mag called The Nerve wanted to do a primer on what they call “Cozmic Country” and asked me to recommend some records and artists for it. So I did. I reprint them here one by one, and if savvy enough, day by day:
Johnny Cash- Everybody Loves A Nut (1966)
Rumour has it that Johnny Cash was so hopped up on amphetamines for this, his
